wait_timer_loc.description: [string]Text to show while wait mode is active from the completion wait time.

revert_timer_loc.description: [string]Text to show when this minigame stage has timed out and is reverting to previous stage.

info_text_loc.description: [string]Text that is shown on objective terminal, usually shown to indicate what the player need to do, or general flavour text.

ui_help_text.description: [string]Text that is shown in the UI - Should be a call to action to the player on what they should be doing at any given step

ui_wait_help_text.description: [string]Text that is shown in the UI while this minigame is in the wait step- Should be a call to action to the player on what they should be doing at any given step
